# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. This exceptional product, valued at $1,200,000 by you, holds a special place in our portfolio due to its innovative features and unparalleled performance. We are offering it to you today at an exclusive price of $1,400,000. This offer represents a unique opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate, tailored to maximize your investment's return. I look forward to discussing the details with you and exploring how this product can contribute to your business success. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,400,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,400,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
